1.0.name: wordpress/wpzon
1.0.description:
With WpZon you are able to add Amazon products into your posts or pages.

Features:

  • Supports US, UK, CA, DE, FR and JP Amazon affiliates
  • Show products by keywords, category and/or subcategory
  • Sort items by bestselling, price, reviews etc.
  • Set the number of products you would like to display
  • Choose between one or two column mode

The plugin uses a shortcode that you can easily insert into your posts, wherever you would like to. A sample shortcode for displaying 10 pressure cookers, sorted by reviews would look like:

[wpzon keywords="pressure cooker" sindex="Kitchen" sort="salesrank" listing="10"]
